title: Phantom Phoenix
info: The Phantom Phoenix is a Hardmode bow dropped by the Ogre mini-boss during the Old One's Army event. It fires two arrows at a time, spreading randomly similarly to the Chlorophyte Shotbow, and also fires a large phoenix with a waving arc every third / fourth shot  . The phoenix explodes on contact, but does not destroy Tiles. It also converts regular arrows into Flaming Arrows, similar to the Molten Fury.
